overview: Self Rescue for Climbers DVD is a comprehensive guide to problem solving in climbing situations, it is aimed at the problems recreational climbers may encounter whether climbing on multi-pitch sea cliffs, mountain routes or road-side crags.  Chapters include:  good belay practice  simple hoists  escaping the system  abseil safety prusiking and equipment testing  also included is a staged Holyhead cliff rescue and a DMM factory visit - the DVD was filmed on location in Malham, Gogarth, Temadog and the LLanberis Pass
title: Self Rescue for Climbers
